meanings.definition: A printmaking technique in which an image is incised into a plate with a hard-pointed needle.
meanings.sent1: The artist used a drypoint to create a beautiful etching on the metal plate.
meanings.sent2: I saw a stunning drypoint of a landscape at the art exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The drypoint accidentally scratched the plate, creating a funny squiggle in the final print.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate touch with the drypoint needle turned the metal into a canvas of intricate lines.
meanings.sent5: The drypoint technique brought out the fine details of the artwork, making it truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The resulting print made from a drypoint plate.
meanings.sent1: The drypoint print captured the essence of the original artwork beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the drypoint to appreciate the intricate details in the print.
meanings.sent3: The drypoint print looked like a mirror image of the plate, creating a playful effect.
meanings.sent4: The drypoint print seemed to come alive with shadows and depth, mesmerizing the viewers.
meanings.sent5: The drypoint print revealed a level of artistry that was truly impressive.
